about_the_game:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------



The field is the world, and the good seed represents the people of the Kingdom. The weeds are the people who belong to the evil one.
(Matthew 13:38)



-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

This story takes place on an island where six investigators have come to examine a mysterious celestial body that has landed there.
The work proceeded for two weeks, everything going smoothly. However, just the day before we were set to return to the mainland, the engine of our only mode of transportation – a fishing boat – was severely damaged.
We had to wait for rescue on the island and were forced to discover some new facts about ? .


This story takes place on an island where six investigators have come to examine a mysterious celestial body that has landed there.
The work proceeded for two weeks, everything going smoothly. However, just the day before we were set to return to the mainland, the engine of our only mode of transportation – a fishing boat – was severely damaged.
We had to wait for rescue on the island. My colleagues and I developed the fields, planting seeds.
These were special seeds, and soon we had a harvest!


This story takes place on an island where six investigators have come to examine a mysterious celestial body that has landed there.
The work proceeded for two weeks, everything going smoothly. Don't look any further; you had a great time on the island!
Isn't that enough? My colleagues and I developed the fields, planting seeds.
These were special seeds, and soon This is a punishment, there won't be harvest anymore, and you won't be able to see this again.


This story takes place on an island where six investigators have come to examine a mysterious celestial body that has landed there.
The work proceeded for two weeks, everything going smoothly.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game includes

  • surrealistic art style

  • Lots of point-and-click puzzles (for survival)

  • many books, and a protagonist who loves reading books

  • A therapy dog

Basic Controls

  • Use the mouse for click-to-interact

  • Click on items in the inventory, then click on corresponding objects for interaction

  • Arrow keys can be used for movement on the map

name: The Dream Of A Cockspur Demo
short_description: Stranded on a desolate island with Earth's final researchers, you investigate a mysterious celestial body. The day before departure, the return boat is damaged, forcing an extended stay. Is someone playing tricks, or does the island want to kill all of you?
